body_html:
Can I ask a maybe naive question?
Why do we need a dedicated implementation for CUDA? Can't we directly dispatch to index_select, which has a (fairly) optimized implementation for CUDA already?
body_text:
Can I ask a maybe naive question?
Why do we need a dedicated implementation for CUDA? Can't we directly dispatch to index_select, which has a (fairly) optimized implementation for CUDA already?
body:
Can I ask a maybe naive question?
Why do we need a dedicated implementation for CUDA? Can't we directly dispatch to `index_select`, which has a (fairly) optimized implementation for CUDA already?
